code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import config from"./config";var squareSize=config.squareSize,barSize=config.barSize,checkerSize=config.checkerSize,checkerFill=config.checkerFill;var usePaintAlpha=function usePaintAlpha(canvas,hue){useEffect(function(){var ctx=canvas.current.getContext("2d");ctx.clearRect(0,0,squareSize,barSize);var rows=Math.round(barSize/checkerSize);var cols=Math.round(squareSize/checkerSize);for(var i=0;i<rows;i++){for(var j=0;j<cols/2;j++){var x=j*checkerSize*2+(i%2?0:checkerSize);var y=i*checkerSize;ctx.rect(x,y,checkerSize,checkerSize);}}ctx.fillStyle=checkerFill;ctx.fill();var gradient=ctx.createLinearGradient(0,0,squareSize,0);gradient.addColorStop(0,"hsla(".concat(hue,", 100%, 50%, 0)"));gradient.addColorStop(1,"hsla(".concat(hue,", 100%, 50%, 1)"));ctx.fillStyle=gradient;ctx.fillRect(0,0,squareSize,barSize);},[canvas,hue]);};export default usePaintAlpha;
